car pool.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a group of people who agree to travel together to work, school etc in one car and share the cost
car pool.translation[0].definitions[1].d: a group of cars that a company or organization owns for its workers or members to use
car pool.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a group of cars owned by a company or other organization that its members can use
car pool.translation[1].definitions[1].d: a group of car owners who agree to go to work together in one car
car pool.translation[1].definitions[1].e: highways with ‘car pool lanes’ for vehicles carrying more than two passengers
